name: Cranky Bamboo!
description:
Can you dominate volcanic mayhem?
Join Cranky the panda in an endless survival challenge as you dodge volcanic rocks to save your life!

FEATURES:
- Enjoy simple and addictive game mechanics in this fast-paced arcade experience that is easy to pick up but impossible to put down.
- Master the ""Art of Bamboo"" in a paper-themed world to unlock all the grumpy animal characters with their fun, cool costumes.
- Enjoy cool, evolving backgrounds, and try to discover all the amazing new secrets before the volcano explodes!
- Use mighty power-ups to obliterate your friends' scores and survive as much volcanic action as you can to get to the top of the leaderboards.
- Beware of lava dragons, and block paper planes and dangerous projectiles with cool power-ups.
- Refine your dodging skills to be the best, and become the zen master of bamboo!
